answers.answer: I was on the same boat but i have good now and im actually due today...The best thing that you can do so.it doesnt go higher is lay on your side and put a pillow on you back to give you some cushion, try to drinks lotsss of water and forget about the salt... now if you see spots or little stars than deff go to er because that means its going up... relax and put your feet up dont get upset and dont take any meds without asking the dr those can get your pressure up too good luck
Thank you for the input! Will definitely do those things!

So I had one high blood pressure. I cut out almost all fast food and restaurant food because it has to much sodium!! Homemade all my food with out using salt... started taking powder magnesium citrate maximum dose and liquid fish oils. Have completely reversed any sign of high blood pressure or preeclampsia! Please do not let them tell you there is nothing you can do... try this please it will help you!
Thank you! I've been trying to avoid salt but didn't know about the magnesium I'll do that too I already have some!

I had high BP with my first pregnancy. and was even induced cause it was high. Cut out as much salt as u can...as hard as it seems try to relax and deep breathing/meditation helps too. If it cant be controlled they might suggest medication. stay positive hun ;-)

question: So yesterday I went in & had high blood pressure for the first time, they did a non stress test & everything was ok but they want me to come in every week instead of every two. I have issues with anxiety & with under 9 weeks to go I'm starting to definitely feel the pressure!Any suggestions on how to keep my blood pressure in check? Ftm & need to stop worrying!!
title: High Blood Pressure
